chaluEntry.title: Chalu Entry
chaluEntry.description: Represents a single chalu/running packet entry in the production log.

kapanNumber.description: The Kapan number for the entry.

suffix.description: The calculated or manually entered suffix for adjustments.

currentPcs.description: The current number of pieces after adjustment.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the entry was created.

jiramEntry.title: Jiram Entry
jiramEntry.description: Represents a single packet scanned during Jiram verification, pending Chalu entry.

kapanNumber.description: The Kapan number extracted from the barcode.

packetNumber.description: The packet number part of the barcode.

suffix.description: The suffix part of the barcode, if any.

scanTime.description: Timestamp when the packet was scanned.

/chaluEntries/{chaluEntryId}.description: Stores all the Chalu/Running packet entries.

/kapans/{kapanId}.description: Stores the list of all available Kapan numbers.

/jiramEntries/{jiramEntryId}.description: Stores packets scanned during Jiram verification that are pending Chalu entry.
